original_text: And they offered him wine mixed with myrrh, but he did not take it.
korean_text: 몰약을 탄 포도주를 주었으나 예수께서 받지 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: And they offered him wine mixed with myrrh
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 몰약을 탄 포도주를 바쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: but he did not take it.
